description.value:
You know every shadow is a portal to the Netherworld, and like an artist molding clay, you sculpt that realm's shadowy substance into dreadful and wondrous shapes at your whim.

Tradition divine

Connection Skill Stealth

Connection Spells cantrip: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Figment]; 1st: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Grim Tendrils]; 2nd: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Invisibility]; 3rd: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Slow]; 4th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Flicker]; 5th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Shadow Blast]; 6th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Mislead]; 7th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Eclipse Burst]; 8th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Disappearance]; 9th: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Phantasmagoria]

Epiphany Spells initial: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Shadow Snap]{Shadow Snap}; advanced: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Cloying Shadows]{Cloying Shadows}; greater: @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Shadow Prison]{Shadow Prison}

Harmony When you Transfer Vitality, the target's shadow darkens and swells, reducing bright light within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] of the target to dim light. This is a form of magical darkness and can overcome non-magical light sources or attempt to counteract magical light. The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Concealed] while in this dim light and can use the concealed condition to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Hide]. This lasts until the end of your next turn.

Perfect Harmony You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Umbral Stride]{Umbral Stride} action. When you Transfer Vitality, the target can use this action once before the end of their next turn.
